sentence.Network_en: Aside from a thorough medical family history, there is no need to offer any genetic testing on the basis of consanguinity alone.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了需要一份详尽的家庭病史之外, 没有必要仅根据有血缘关系这一条理由就进行任何的基因测试.

sentence.Network_en: They too have been deaf to the voice of justice and of consanguinity.

sentence.Network_en: The identity in the primitive society was based on consanguinity.
sentence.Network_cn: 原始社会存在身份,但这种身份是建立在血缘基础之上的.
